name: UKNIGHT
short_description:
Uknight Adventures is a 3D Side Scrolling platform adventure game, solve puzzles, fight enemy's, defeat bosses and travel the world to collect coins!
Great for Kids!
Stunning graphics for mobile devices!
-
Once upon a time long ago, there lived a small boy "U".
U longed to become a knight and win the hand of the princess.
Darkness rolled over the country bringing to the lands an evil knight.
Dark, the evil knight spread all the kings gold throughout the land and locked the princess in the cells of the dark castle.
U must U-Knight your self with the princess and gather all the gold throughout the kingdom.
Be aware as there are many forces throughout the land that are under control of the dark knight.
U must solve puzzles along your adventure to save the princess!
summary: Uknight Adventures is a 3D Side Scrolling platform adventure game,
